body.p: Beriah Mogoffin Govenor of Kentucky. Whereas Such is the threathening aspect of public affairs, and civil war is so iminent, it is the part of prudence and patriotism that I ask at your hand. The appointment of an office of Col or Commandent of a Regiment in The Green River Country or some other. For I Served a twoer in the War with Mexico and their learned Military tactic and the use of arms. Which I have made my study evry Since, and feel confident that I can dscharge the duty of that office with honor to you and my native state. For Refferences Y. A. Ginn of Trigg our representative or Hon H. C. Burnett. I am Ready to go any wher that I am ordered. Whith those remarks I Remain Your Servent.

James Thomas
Jas Thomas
Trigg Co
And Apr 29. 1861
